text:
Hello all!  Jacob Vaverka here.  I work at General Motors on a team that brings FOSS to High Performance Computing.  My main work focus is in CFD and CAE workflows.  I 'm also working toward a masters degree in Applied & Computational Math.  This program is where I was introduced to Julia about 2 years ago.  Now I use Julia for all sorts of personal projects (usually deployed via web as Heroku apps).  BUT I'd really love to get involved with growing Julia's capabilities in enterprise CAE.

On a personal note I love hiking, yoga, and movies.  Excited to be here :nerd_face: feel free to <https://vaverka.gitlab.io/|check out my site> (_*built using Franklin*_) to learn more.

text: Very cool! I can finally stop being so ambivalent about car manufactures like GM after they announced they're moving to all EV

text: Welcome and cool website! Your post about 5 years definitely resonated. Hope to see you around!

text:
<@U8JP5B9T2> Yeah, we're all very excited about the shift!  Been a while coming.  It will be fun to get more involved with the simulations specific to EV.

<@U01BD7YGV27> That's so nice to hear, likewise! :bow:
